data.author: Hellen Keller
data.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.

data.author: Mother Teresa
data.quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.

data.author: Willie Nelson
data.quote: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you’ll start having positive results.

data.author: Lyndon B. Johnson
data.quote: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.

data.author: Michael D. Higgins
data.quote: I hope that at the end of the seven years, people will say that I have been of some inspirational value to them at home in terms of inclusiveness and abroad, I look forward to representing Ireland.

data.author: Dalai Lama
data.quote: SIn order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision.

data.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
data.quote: I firmly believe that unless one has tasted the bitter pill of failure, one cannot aspire enough for success.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: I always like to look on the optimistic side of life, but I am realistic enough to know that life is a complex matter.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.

data.author: William James
data.quote: Pessimism leads to weakness, optimism to power..

data.author: William Blake
data.quote: If the doors of perception were cleansed everything would appear to man as it is, infinite.

data.author: Deepak Chopra
data.quote: You can’t make positive choices for the rest of your life without an environment that makes those choices easy, natural, and enjoyable.

data.author: Anne Frank
data.quote: Everyone has inside of him a piece of good news. The good news is that you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is!

data.author: Josh McDaniels
data.quote: Of all the things people have taught me regarding life lessons or anything that would benefit me, I don't think anything helped me learn more about life than football. You go through so many different things: adversity, how to handle adversity, how to handle success, how to lead, how to be a teammate, how to communicate.

data.author: Lee lacocca
data.quote: The thing that lies at the foundation of positive change, the way I see it, is service to a fellow human being..

data.author: MHarvey Mackay
data.quote: Positive thinking is more than just a tagline. It changes the way we behave. And I firmly believe that when I am positive, it not only makes me better, but it also makes those around me better.

data.author: Gertrude Himmelfarb
data.quote: Nothing is as seductive as the assurance of success.

data.author: Les Brown
data.quote: In every day, there are 1,440 minutes. That means we have 1,440 daily opportunities to make a positive impact.

data.author: Shah Rukh Khan
data.quote: Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble.

data.author: Wallis Simpson
data.quote: For a gallant spirit there can never be defeat.

data.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
data.quote: A great social success is a pretty girl who plays her cards as carefully as if she were plain.

data.author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon
data.quote: When deeds speak, words are nothing.
